About the Company: IG Petrochemicals Ltd`s principal business revolves around the production of Phthalic Anhydride, which is mainly used in the manufacture of Plasticizers for production of PVC products, shoe soles and other commodities.Phthalic Anhydride is also used for manufacturing Alkyd Resins which is used in paints, as an intermediate in production of dyes and pigments, and in production of Unsaturated Polyester Resins (UPRs).
